description:
Creating quilting with an embroidery machine?

In this Bernina software 7 course we will start by using our Bernina Embroidery Software to create applique designs for our quilt block.

  1. In this class I show you from planning applique and quilting stitch choices, to creating it in you Bernina Embroidery Software 7 or any version.
  2. Easy downloadable video can be saved on your computer to use whenever you want
  3. Each step is so easy to follow, and pause the recording, complete it, and then come back is made easy for your enjoyment
  4. Quilt as you go a unique technique without strips for joining quilt blocks done
  5. Complete layers, embellished and quilt stitch out so a complete block with minor trimmings are ready
  6. Any Quilter, Embroiderer and digitizer will have so much benefits using this.

I am sure you will, like me enjoy your Bernina Embroidery Software 7 and would use it for a lot more than just organising your embroidery designs
title: Bernina Software 7 Class12 From Embroidery to Quilting
